item.description:
So it's cold and raining but we can still have some fun, right?!

When's the last time you went bowling?

When's the next time?

Today at 6pm, that's when.

Bowl-O-Rama is on Route 1 in Portsmouth.  This is New England candlepin so the balls aren't heavy.  It's a clean, smoke-free place but there's a bar for food and drinks.

Come on out and we'll forget it's raining outside.

Beginning at 7pm it's COSMIC BOWLING with a live DJ.

Cosmic Bowling is glow-in-the-dark bowling with music from the 70s, 80s, and 90s that rocks the center with a state-of-the-art sound system. Consisting of a light show, fog machine, as well as a DJ who keeps the center rockin', it really is the place to be to rock 'n' bowl!!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask which lane Larry's group is on.
item.name: Rock n Bowling
